name: Patties (Curry Puffs)
description: Flaky pastry filled with spiced meat or fish
instructions: Make pastry with flour, butter, egg
Cook filling with meat, onions, curry powder
cultural_notes: Popular street food and party snack
description_sinhala: කුළුබඩු සහිත මස් හෝ මාළු පිරවූ පියලි පේස්ට්‍රි
description_tamil: மசாலா இறைச்சி அல்லது மீன் நிரப்பப்பட்ட மெல்லிய பேஸ்ட்ரி
cultural_notes_sinhala: ජනප්‍රිය වීදි ආහාර සහ උත්සව සුලු කෑම
